text: What's the logic behind having only 3 levels of nesting in groups available?
<@UDFTHC6PK> I asked a while back and they said it was UI considerations at the time. I've heard they are going to open that up (hopefully soon). IMHO even 1 more level opens up so much opportunity.

Cool. Good to know. I've definitely hit that wall a couple more times than I feel comfortable. Usually you canfind a way to work around it....it's just so much nicer to control a group as opposed to individual fields

If you create a <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/forums/postpage/board-id/HubSpot_Ideas|feature request> i will have my colleagues give you some kudoâ€™s. This is an issue in a lot of our projects as well.
